archimate:Requirement.name: SY.2.3.7a: a) storing backup media (e.g. DVDs, magnetic tapes, computer disks) in accordance with manufacturer specifications and considering the risk of media deterioration
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
